Meridian.Nampa Gateway Center:
Nampa Gateway Center is a lifestyle center located in Nampa, Idaho, United States. The center is owned by RCG Ventures and is anchored by CircusTrix Idaho, Crunch Fitness, Edwards Cinemas, J. C. Penney, Shoe Carnival, and WinCo Foods.


== History ==
The shopping center opened August 3, 2007 with the opening of the center's J. C. Penney department store, marking the return of the retail chain to Nampa after a 19-year absence.
